name: Bog's Adventures in the Underworld
summary: Poor hen pecked Bog tries his best to please Clod, his wife, but when he tries to improve on her famous 'Mushy Mush' recipe, things don't go according to plan and Bog ends up in Hell, the Underworld. Help Bog to find his way back to Clod and patch up their relationship. There are two possible main endings and a little extra bit for anyone that manages to achieve the maximum score.
